roleset.name: counteract, prevent
roleset.note: UNDERCUT-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. No comparison. (from undercut.01-v)

example.name: transitive, active, agentive, all those things
example.text: Moreover, the price volatility that is amplified by program trading is undercutting efforts to woo individual investors back to an OTC market that sorely misses them.
example.arg: the price volatility that is amplified by program trading
efforts to woo individual investors back to an OTC market that sorely misses them
